prompt: A friend has asked you to help plan their visit to your country. Write a letter suggesting places to visit, activities to do, and explaining how you can assist during their stay.

rubric.task_achievement: Addresses all parts of the question in a natural and friendly tone.
rubric.coherence_cohesion: Uses smooth transitions between suggestions and explanations.
rubric.lexical_resource: Variety of expressions related to travel, hospitality, and personal tone.
rubric.grammar_range_accuracy: Uses informal but grammatically correct forms, contractions, and complex structures.

band_estimation_guidelines.CLB6: Covers points but may sound unnatural or incomplete.
band_estimation_guidelines.CLB7: Generally clear and friendly with occasional grammar slips.
band_estimation_guidelines.CLB8: Engaging tone with appropriate range of informal vocabulary.
band_estimation_guidelines.CLB9: Fluent, natural, and fully cohesive friendly letter.
